title: #229 – Richard Wrangham: Role of Violence, Sex, and Fire in Human Evolution
description: Richard Wrangham is a biological anthropologist at Harvard, specializing in the study of primates and the evolution of violence, sex, cooking, culture, and other aspects of ape and human behavior.
